channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Fall 2024 URP Applications Now Being Accepted
item.description: The Office of Undergraduate Education is currently accepting Undergraduate Research Program (URP) applications for the Fall 2024 semester! Through the URP, full- and part-time undergraduate students may pursue research for academic credit or as a paid research assistant working in the labs of world-leading Rensselaer faculty researchers during the academic year.
item.author: Students

item.title: Campus Summer Shuttle Service to Continue for City Station Residents
item.description: The Office of Parking and Transportation will be continuing shuttle service to Rensselaer students living at the City Station residences for the summer, with shuttle service to run from 10AM to 10PM Monday through Saturday, and from noon to 8PM on Sunday. The City Station shuttle bus stop is located in front of City Station East.
item.author: Students

item.title: New Graduate Student Welcome to be Held August 27
item.description: Date: Tuesday, August 27, 2024 12:00 PM - 6:00 PM - Following check-in and a boxed lunch, this event will feature a welcome and introductions, a student panel, small group breakout sessions, a resource fair, and a coffee hour with all graduate students.
item.author: Students

item.title: Fall 2024 Academic and Refund Policy Changes Announced
item.description: Over the past year, Provost Rebecca Doerge carefully reviewed the Institute’s academic policies and procedures alongside student leaders and academic and administrative groups. Based on their findings, she is excited to announce drop period, refund, and undergraduate course repeat policy changes that will become effective for the Fall 2024 semester.
item.author: Community

item.title: Middle States Accreditation Community Open Forum Event Scheduled for August 27
item.description: From 2:00PM to 3:00PM on Tuesday, August 27, the Middle States Committee will be hosting an open forum to present the findings of the Middle States Self-Study draft and obtain additional feedback. The in-person event will take place in the CBIS Isermann Auditorium; participants can also choose to attend the forum remotely via Webex.
item.author: Community

item.title: Mathematical Sciences Colloquium to be Held August 29
item.description: Date: Thursday, August 29, 2024 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM - This Mathematical Sciences colloquium will feature a presentation titled “Simulation of molecules and materials from the first-principles of quantum mechanics” by speaker Eric Cancès from École des Ponts ParisTech.
item.author: Community

item.title: TLC Announces Fall 2024 Faculty/Staff Teaching and Learning Opportunities
item.description:
The Teaching and Learning Collaboratory (TLC) has just announced the upcoming trainings for Rensselaer faculty and staff for the Fall 2024 term. Please be sure to visit TLC’s training page for a list of upcoming sessions, as well as their dates, times, formats, and registration links.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
